title: Seyph's Art Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> Welcome, wanderer !
>
> Here you'll find various things about some parts of the universe, SCPs and tales I like.
> Old and new art, good and bad art. Stupid art maybe...
> I just left behind some drawings because they were not really interesting for foreign readers[[footnote]] If you're a master of google translate and you don't fear very specific content, here is the original and complete version of this page : http://fondationscp.wikidot.com/galerie-d-illustrations-de-seyph.[[/footnote]].
>
> Enjoy !


**SCPs :**
